name: MEC Charrington Paddle Bag
description: Protect your take-apart kayak paddles during transit with this handy carrying bag. Fits 2 paddles, including bent-shaft styles and has 4 internal sleeves to baby your blades.Abrasion resistant 600-denier polyester, 210-denier nylon lining.Locking, 2-way zipper.Attachment rings for a shoulder strap (sold separately).Webbing loop for hanging.Easy to grab top handle.Pocket fits keys and small items.Length is 130cm, width at ends 20cm, width at middle 16cm.
